Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Vertical City Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Guangzhou, convenient to Haiyin Park and Huaisheng Mosque. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Gold Coast Water Park and Haizhu Wholesale Market.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 202 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 42-inch LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance. The beach shuttle (surcharge) makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Vertical City Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Guangzhou, convenient to Haiyin Park and Huaisheng Mosque. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Gold Coast Water Park and Haizhu Wholesale Market.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Haiyin Park - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Gold Coast Water Park - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Haizhu Wholesale Market - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Onelink Plaza - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Sacred Heart Cathedral - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Canton Customs Building - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Guangzhou Culture Park - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Xinghai Concert Hall - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Guangdong Museum of Art - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Guangdong Provincial Museum - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Temple of Five Genies - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Beijing Road Pedestrian Street - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Baie-Tan Bar Street - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Nanyue Kingdom Palace Museum - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Shangxiajiu Pedestrian Street - 4 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Vertical City Hotel is Guangzhou (CAN-Baiyun Intl.) - 34.2 km / 21.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
